text: Yager is a combat flight simulation video game. It was developed by Yager Development. It was published by THQ, Kemco, and DreamCatcher Interactive. It was first released as an Xbox exclusive. Later being ported to Microsoft Windows, both in 2003. The Xbox version was released in North America in later 2004, while the PC version was released in North America as Aerial Strike: Low Altitude - High Stakes: The Yager Missions in February 2005. The game was not a commercial success in larger part because of a delayed North American release in a lack of advertising. == Reception == Yager and Aerial Strike received "mixed or average reviews" according to the review aggregation website Metacritic. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Xbox games Category:Windows games Category:THQ games Category:2003 video games
title: Yager
